mapper.sql: iid, iwebsiteid, cparentsku, ccreateuser, dcreatedate, clastupdateuser, dlastupdatedate
mapper.insert:
insert into t_product_multiattribute_base (iwebsiteid, cparentsku, ccreateuser, dcreatedate, clastupdateuser, dlastupdatedate) values
(#{item.iwebsiteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cparentsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ccreateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dcreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.clastupdateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dlastupdatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
